speaker: narrator
dialog: Walking past a practice field you are barely able to dodge as a football rushes past you.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Regaining your barings you pick up the ball and are able to throw it back when Prince Rod runs up to you.

speaker: rod
dialog: Ah sorry about that! Say you dodged pretty well, want to do a few games with us?

speaker: rod
dialog: Really? That's great! Come on I'll introduce you to the rest of the team!

speaker: narrator
dialog: After some quick introductions you are put on the team with Prince Rod.

speaker: narrator
dialog: During one game you get the ball and have the choice of picking between Prince Rod and another classmate.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Prince Rod doesn't seem to see he'll be blocked easily while the other classmate will be able to score. Who do you want to shoot it towards?

speaker: narrator
dialog: Shooting the ball towards Prince Rod he is immediately intercepted by the other team who scores a goal. Rod looks disappointed that he didn't notice them.

speaker: narrator
dialog: You start running with the ball towards the goal yourself. Unfortunately you're intercepted by the other team who gains control of the ball.

speaker: narrator
dialog: You shoot it towards your other classmate and they score the goal. Rod looks impressed with your perception skills.

speaker: rod
dialog: Alright teams! Let's wrap up for now! Thanks for playing along Taylor, I'll see you around!

speaker: narrator
dialog: And with that Rod is off. You get the feeling that Rod really enjoyed your company.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Prince Rod gets this look of disappointment before turning back to the group.

speaker: rod
dialog: Well, alright. Just remember I'm just a student like you when I'm here and you're free to join in any activities I'm in.

speaker: narrator
dialog: And with that Prince Rod is off. You get the feeling that wasn't the answer he was looking for.
